sourcesContent: S/N Receipt Date Case Name Claim Start Claim End Prepop Status DIRECT Payday Matched Attendance {{ i + 1 }} {{ record.receiptDate }} {{ record.caseId }} {{ record.name }} {{ record.claimStart }} {{ record.claimEnd }} {{ record.prepop }} {{ record.status }} {{ record.directPayday }} {{ record.matchedAttendance }} import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-company-claim-tab', templateUrl: './company-claim-tab.component.html', styleUrls: ['./company-claim-tab.component.scss'] }) export class CompanyClaimTabComponent implements OnInit { sampleData = [ { receiptDate: "29-10-2021", caseId: "E121-1024", name: "S1234567A Tan Ah Kow", claimStart: "10-10-2021", claimEnd: "21-10-2021", prepop: "Yes", status: "COMPLETED", directPayday: "21-10-2021", matchedAttendance: "10-10-2021 to 21-10-2021"}, { receiptDate: "29-09-2021", caseId: "E121-1023", name: "S1234567B Lim Ah Seng", claimStart: "10-09-2021", claimEnd: "21-09-2021", prepop: "No", status: "COMPLETED", directPayday: "21-09-2021", matchedAttendance: "10-09-2021 to 21-09-2021"}, { receiptDate: "29-08-2021", caseId: "E121-1022", name: "S1234567C Goh Ah Beng", claimStart: "10-08-2021", claimEnd: "21-08-2021", prepop: "No", status: "COMPLETED", directPayday: "21-08-2021", matchedAttendance: "10-08-2021 to 21-08-2021"}, { receiptDate: "29-07-2021", caseId: "E121-1021", name: "S1234567A Tan Ah Kow", claimStart: "10-07-2021", claimEnd: "21-07-2021", prepop: "No", status: "COMPLETED", directPayday: "21-07-2021", matchedAttendance: "10-07-2021 to 21-07-2021"}, ] constructor() { // to do } ngOnInit(): void { // to do } exportCSV(): void { // to do } }
